sub_topic: The Hausdorff dimension of the Sierpinski triangle.
message_1:
What is the Hausdorff dimension of the Sierpinski triangle?

Note: The Hausdorff dimension of the Sierpinski triangle is precisely log 3 / log 2, a non-integer value.
message_2: The Hausdorff dimension of the Sierpinski triangle is indeed log 3 / log 2, which is approximately 1.58496. This non-integer value reflects the fractal nature of the Sierpinski triangle.
